titleStmt.title: The estate of the Empire, or, An abridgement of the laws and government of Germany cast into dialogues for the greater conveniency of a young prince that was instructed therein / by Lewis Du-May ... ; translated into French by D'Alexis Esq. ... ; now faithfully rendered into English.
titleStmt.author: Dumay, Louis, d. 1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Norton for Richard Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
